events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to return it and get a refund because it does not fit as expected.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to product return.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Iâ€™m here to help you with returning your jacket and getting your refund processed.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original condition?
My order number is 123456789. The jacket is unworn and still has the tags attached.
Thank you for the details. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly. Once received, the full refund will be processed.
Thanks for the clear instructions; I appreciate the quick response and help with the return.
We have received your returned jacket and completed your refund today. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to appear on your original payment method.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
